introduction: SYNOPSISJin-suk is an earnest person but faces the limitation of being Korean in Japan. As she gives way to despair and attempt to take her own life, a tempting offer drags her into the dark side of the city. Dong-wun extends a helping hand to her lost soul but he has to pay for their innocent love with threat and violence inflicted on him. Just when they are about to mark the closer of their wandering, the devil fires his anger at them and their journey ends there.故事当遭受羞辱的金石即将自杀时，另一个黑色的夹子将她吸引到一个辉煌的生活中，并把她关在笼子里。当从对方的情感的高峰流浪的游荡被打倒，流浪的灵魂被打倒，持久魔鬼的枪口呼吸在他们面前的火在遥远的异国土地上，一个悲伤的时期采取的爱情和心碎dongun jinsuk的旅程。
